statements: SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, age FROM clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT client_name, address FROM clients WHERE financial_goal = 'Retirement';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT client_name, investment_preference FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, age FROM clients WHERE financial_goal = 'Retirement' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM clients WHERE investment_preference = 'High Risk';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE age < 40 AND financial_goal = 'Savings' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT client_name, financial_goal FROM clients WHERE address LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_phone, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_age >= 25 AND client_age <= 35;
SELECT clients.client_name, financial_goal FROM financial_data INNER JOIN clients ON financial_data.client_id = clients.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC, client_age DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;

SELECT clients.client_name, financial_data.financial_goal FROM clients JOIN financial_data ON clients.client_id = financial_data.client_id WHERE financial_goal LIKE '%retirement%' ORDER BY clients.client_name DESC;
SELECT clients.*, financial_data.investment_preferences FROM clients LEFT JOIN financial_data ON clients.client_id = financial_data.client_id WHERE clients.client_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT clients.client_name, financial_data.investment_preferences FROM clients JOIN financial_data ON clients.client_id = financial_data.client_id WHERE clients.client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY financial_data.investment_preferences ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_goals WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT goal_description, goal_due_date FROM financial_goals ORDER BY goal_due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients JOIN financial_goals ON clients.client_id = financial_goals.client_id;
SELECT client_name, client_email, goal_description FROM clients INNER JOIN financial_goals ON clients.client_id = financial_goals.client_id;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM clients JOIN investment_preferences ON clients.client_id = investment_preferences.client_id WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT goal_description, client_phone FROM financial_goals JOIN clients ON financial_goals.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance, goal_due_date FROM clients JOIN financial_goals ON clients.client_id = financial_goals.client_id ORDER BY goal_due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT goal_description FROM financial_goals WHERE goal_status = 'pending';
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients JOIN investment_preferences ON clients.client_id = investment_preferences.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_age < 40 ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT g.goal_id, g.goal_description, g.goal_status, c.client_name FROM financial_goals g JOIN clients c ON g.client_id = c.client_id WHERE g.goal_status = 'in progress';
SELECT c.client_name, i.risk_tolerance, i.investment_style FROM clients c JOIN investment_preferences i ON c.client_id = i.client_id WHERE i.risk_tolerance = 'high' ORDER BY i.preference_id ASC;
SELECT w.management_id, w.client_id, w.management_type, w.management_fee, c.client_name FROM wealth_management w JOIN clients c ON w.client_id = c.client_id WHERE w.management_fee > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Financial_Advisor;
SELECT * FROM Client_Information WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Client_Information ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT goal_description FROM Financial_Goals WHERE goal_type = 'Retirement';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' AND investment_amount >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM Financial_Advisor WHERE advisor_id = 12345;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Client_Information WHERE client_age > 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT goal_name, goal_amount FROM Financial_Goals WHERE goal_amount BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY goal_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Medium' OR investment_amount >= 10000;

SELECT advisor_name, client_name, goal_name FROM Financial_Advisor JOIN Client_Information ON Financial_Advisor.advisor_id = Client_Information.advisor_id JOIN Financial_Goals ON Client_Information.client_id = Financial_Goals.client_id WHERE Financial_Goals.goal_type = 'Retirement';
